channel.title: Deep Learning From Scratch on Robin Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning From Scratch on Robin Smith

item.title: Wrap Up
item.description: After running through the book and getting a fully working feed-forward deep learning API and learning the inner workings of neural networks as a result, I’ve decided not to pursue this particular book any further. The purpose of reading this particular book was to enable me to get a better understanding into what makes neural networks tick, and as a result it was necessary to write this series of posts with diagrams, maths, and code.
